message.content:
1. Group IV had shorter postoperative eye-opening times compared to other groups.
2. Group IV had shorter postoperative extubation times compared to other groups.
3. The difference in postoperative eye-opening and extubation times between Group IV and other groups was statistically significant (P<0.05).
4. Group IV had higher restlessness scores compared to other groups.
5. Group IV had higher pain scores compared to other groups.
6. The difference in restlessness and pain scores between Group IV and other groups was statistically significant (P<0.01).

messages.content:
Statement: Although group IV had shorter postoperative eye-opening and extubation times compared with the other groups (P<0.05), it also had higher restlessness and pain scores (P<0.01).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
